item.title: MalwareTech Challenge #1
item.description: Windows Reversing # Strings1 # Hello friend, in this challenge we are given a PE file named strings1.exe_ . The rule of this challenge is that we can only use static analysis to solve it, that’s why there is “_” at the end of the PE file name, which is to prevent us from accidentally running it. The description of this challenge: strings1.exe contains an un-encrypted flag stored within the executable.
